title: How to Make a Starbucks Mocha Creme Frappuccino

steps.headline: Get all of your ingredients ready (see the 'Ingredients' section).
Put all of your ingredients into the blender.
steps.description: Blend on "smoothie" for about 20 seconds. Then, blend on "liquefy"for about 15 seconds.

steps.headline: Pour into your mug, and don't forget to add the straw too (optional)!
Swirl the whipped cream on top and drizzle some chocolate syrup over it.
steps.description: You now have your perfect Starbucks Mocha Crème Frappuccino! Enjoy!

text: Get all of your ingredients ready (see the 'Ingredients' section).  Put all of your ingredients into the blender. Blend on "smoothie" for about 20 seconds. Then, blend on "liquefy"for about 15 seconds. Pour into your mug, and don't forget to add the straw too (optional)!  Swirl the whipped cream on top and drizzle some chocolate syrup over it. You now have your perfect Starbucks Mocha Crème Frappuccino! Enjoy!
